description.zh-cn: 1949年至1955年存在于越南的政权，为法兰西联盟构成国，实行君主立宪制。在日内瓦会议后，其统治范围被限定在北纬17度线以南，后被越南共和国取代。
description.en: A state that existed in Vietnam from 1949 to 1955. It was a constituent state of the French Union under a constitutional monarchy. After the Geneva Conference, its rule was limited to the south of the 17th parallel, and it was later replaced by the Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南阮朝的末代皇帝，后担任越南国国长。在1955年的公民投票后被废黜。
description.en: The last emperor of the Nguyễn dynasty in Vietnam, who later served as the Chief of State of the State of Vietnam. He was deposed after the 1955 referendum.

description.zh-cn: 越南国末任首相，通过1955年公民投票废黜保大帝，成立越南共和国并担任首任总统。
description.en: The last Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam, who deposed Bảo Đại through the 1955 referendum, established the Republic of Vietnam, and became its first president.

description.zh-cn: 由法兰西第四共和国创建的政治实体，用以取代旧的法兰西殖民帝国。越南国曾是其构成国。
description.en: A political entity created by the French Fourth Republic to replace the old French colonial empire. The State of Vietnam was one of its constituent states.

description.zh-cn: 旨在解决朝鲜半岛问题和恢复印度支那和平的国际会议。会议决定以北纬17度线为界将越南分为南北两部分，并使越南国从法兰西联盟完全独立。
description.en: An international conference aimed at resolving the Korean Peninsula issue and restoring peace in Indochina. The conference decided to divide Vietnam into northern and southern parts along the 17th parallel and granted the State of Vietnam full independence from the French Union.

description.zh-cn: 通常被称为“南越”，是根据1954年日内瓦协议在越南南方建立的国家，由吴廷琰成立以取代越南国。
description.en: Commonly known as South Vietnam, it was a state established in the southern part of Vietnam according to the 1954 Geneva Accords, founded by Ngô Đình Diệm to replace the State of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 由吴廷琰组织的公民投票，旨在决定南越的未来政体。投票结果导致保大帝被废黜，越南共和国成立。选举过程被广泛认为存在严重舞弊。
description.en: A referendum organized by Ngô Đình Diệm to determine the future political system of South Vietnam. The result led to the deposition of Bảo Đại and the establishment of the Republic of Vietnam. The election process is widely considered to have been fraudulent.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产主义革命家，越南民主共和国的创始人和首任国家主席。在第一次印度支那战争中与越南国及法国对抗。
description.en: A Vietnamese communist revolutionary, founder and first president of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam. He fought against the State of Vietnam and France during the First Indochina War.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，前殖民帝国。为削弱胡志明在越南的影响力，支持成立越南国。
description.en: A European country and former colonial empire. It supported the establishment of the State of Vietnam to weaken the influence of Hồ Chí Minh.

description.zh-cn: 在越南国正式成立前存在的过渡政府，由阮文春领导。
description.en: A transitional government that existed before the formal establishment of the State of Vietnam, led by Nguyễn Văn Xuân.

description.zh-cn: 越盟与法国及其支持的越南国之间为争夺越南控制权而进行的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Việt Minh and France, along with its supported State of Vietnam, for control over Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 由胡志明等人于1941年成立的越南独立运动组织，在第一次印度支那战争中与越南国作战。
description.en: A Vietnamese independence movement organization founded in 1941 by Hồ Chí Minh and others, which fought against the State of Vietnam in the First Indochina War.

description.zh-cn: 越南国的国防力量，由保大帝根据《爱丽舍协定》建立，由阮文馨将军指挥。
description.en: The defense force of the State of Vietnam, established by Emperor Bảo Đại under the Élysée Accords and commanded by General Nguyễn Văn Hinh.

description.zh-cn: 法国在1946年至1958年期间的共和政府。在第一次印度支那战争期间支持越南国。
description.en: The republican government of France from 1946 to 1958. It supported the State of Vietnam during the First Indochina War.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家。在1950年至1954年期间支持越南国以对抗共产主义势力。
description.en: A country in North America. It supported the State of Vietnam from 1950 to 1954 to counter communist forces.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。在第一次印度支那战争期间向胡志明领导的越盟提供支持。
description.en: A country in East Asia. It provided support to the Việt Minh led by Hồ Chí Minh during the First Indochina War.

description.zh-cn: 前欧亚大陆的社会主义国家。在第一次印度支那战争期间向胡志明提供支持。
description.en: A former socialist state in Eurasia. It provided support to Hồ Chí Minh during the First Indochina War.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治人物，曾任越南临时中央政府总理。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the Prime Minister of the Provisional Central Government of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治人物，曾于1950年短暂担任越南国总理。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who briefly served as the Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治人物，于1950年至1952年担任越南国总理。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam from 1950 to 1952.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治人物，于1952年至1953年担任越南国总理。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who served as the Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam from 1952 to 1953.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治人物，于1954年短暂担任越南国总理。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician who briefly served as the Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治人物，吴廷琰的弟弟和首席政治顾问。在1955年公民投票中积极支持其兄。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician, younger brother and chief political advisor to Ngô Đình Diệm. He actively supported his brother in the 1955 referendum.

description.zh-cn: 由吴廷瑈为支持其兄吴廷琰政权而创建的越南政党。在1955年公民投票中发挥了重要作用。
description.en: A Vietnamese political party created by Ngô Đình Nhu to support the regime of his brother Ngô Đình Diệm. It played a significant role in the 1955 referendum.

description.zh-cn: 法国总统与保大帝签署的协定，允许越南国建立自己的军队，即越南国军。
description.en: An agreement signed by the President of France and Emperor Bảo Đại, which allowed the State of Vietnam to create its own army, the Vietnamese National Army.

description.zh-cn: 越南国军的第一任总指挥官。
description.en: The first commander-in-chief of the Vietnamese National Army.

description.zh-cn: 越南国的一种特殊行政区划，由保大帝直接管辖，主要包含少数民族地区。
description.en: A special administrative division within the State of Vietnam, directly administered by Emperor Bảo Đại, primarily consisting of ethnic minority areas.

description.zh-cn: 越南国于1949年7月2日正式成立，取代了此前的越南临时中央政府。
description.en: The State of Vietnam was formally established on July 2, 1949, replacing the previous Provisional Central Government of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1955年的公民投票导致越南国被改组为越南共和国。
description.en: The 1955 referendum led to the State of Vietnam being reorganized into the Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南国在1949年至1954年间是法兰西联盟的构成国。
description.en: The State of Vietnam was a constituent state of the French Union from 1949 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 保大帝是越南国的国家元首，头衔为国长。
description.en: Bảo Đại was the head of state of the State of Vietnam, with the title of Chief of State.

description.zh-cn: 在担任国长的同时，保大帝也短暂兼任越南国首任总理。
description.en: While serving as Chief of State, Bảo Đại also briefly served as the first Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 为削弱胡志明在越南的影响力，法国支持逊帝保大出山建立越南国，作为本地的替代政府。
description.en: To weaken the influence of Hồ Chí Minh in Vietnam, France supported the abdicated emperor Bảo Đại in establishing the State of Vietnam as an alternative local government.

description.zh-cn: 在由吴廷琰主导的公民投票中，保大帝被废黜，结束了其国长身份。
description.en: In the referendum led by Ngô Đình Diệm, Bảo Đại was deposed, ending his status as Chief of State.

description.zh-cn: 吴廷琰于1954年出任越南国总理，是该政权的末任总理。
description.en: Ngô Đình Diệm became the Prime Minister of the State of Vietnam in 1954, serving as the last prime minister of the regime.

description.zh-cn: 吴廷琰在1955年公民投票后，宣告成立越南共和国，并成为其第一任总统。
description.en: After the 1955 referendum, Ngô Đình Diệm proclaimed the establishment of the Republic of Vietnam and became its first president.

description.zh-cn: 该次公民投票的结果直接促成了越南共和国的成立。
description.en: The result of this referendum directly led to the establishment of the Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次印度支那战争期间，越南国作为法国支持的政权，与共产党领导的越盟进行军事对抗以争夺越南的合法统治权。
description.en: During the First Indochina War, the State of Vietnam, as a French-backed regime, militarily confronted the communist-led Việt Minh for the legitimate rule of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 日内瓦会议决定以北纬17度线为界将越南分裂，导致越南国的统治范围被限定在南方。
description.en: The Geneva Conference decided to divide Vietnam at the 17th parallel, which restricted the State of Vietnam's rule to the south.

description.zh-cn: 日内瓦会议的成果之一是越南国从法兰西联盟获得完全独立。
description.en: One outcome of the Geneva Conference was the State of Vietnam gaining full independence from the French Union.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次印度支那战争期间，法兰西第四共和国是越南国的主要支持者。
description.en: During the First Indochina War, the French Fourth Republic was the main supporter of the State of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 美国在1950年至1954年间向越南国提供支持，以对抗共产主义势力在东南亚的扩张。
description.en: The United States provided support to the State of Vietnam between 1950 and 1954 to counter the expansion of communist forces in Southeast Asia.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次印度支那战争中，中华人民共和国是胡志明领导的越盟的后援。
description.en: During the First Indochina War, the People's Republic of China was a supporter of the Việt Minh led by Hồ Chí Minh.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次印度支那战争中，苏联向胡志明领导的越盟提供了少量支持。
description.en: During the First Indochina War, the Soviet Union provided some support to the Việt Minh led by Hồ Chí Minh.

description.zh-cn: 1949年签署的《爱丽舍协定》允许保大帝建立越南国军作为其国防力量。
description.en: The Élysée Accords signed in 1949 allowed Bảo Đại to establish the Vietnamese National Army as his defense force.

description.zh-cn: 保大帝根据《爱丽舍协定》建立了越南国军。
description.en: Bảo Đại established the Vietnamese National Army based on the Élysée Accords.

description.zh-cn: 越南国军是越南国的国防力量，效忠于该政权。
description.en: The Vietnamese National Army was the defense force of the State of Vietnam and was loyal to the regime.

description.zh-cn: 阮文馨将军是越南国军的指挥官。
description.en: General Nguyễn Văn Hinh was the commander of the Vietnamese National Army.

description.zh-cn: 阮文春是越南临时中央政府的总理。
description.en: Nguyễn Văn Xuân was the Prime Minister of the Provisional Central Government of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 在1955年公民投票期间，吴廷瑈与勤劳党共同组织和监督选举，支持其兄吴廷琰，并策划了贬损保大声誉的宣传活动。
description.en: During the 1955 referendum, Ngô Đình Nhu, along with the Can Lao Party, organized and supervised the election in support of his brother Ngô Đình Diệm, and orchestrated a propaganda campaign to discredit Bảo Đại.

description.zh-cn: 在1955年公民投票期间，勤劳党在组织和监督选举过程中支援吴廷琰的选举基础。
description.en: During the 1955 referendum, the Can Lao Party supported Ngô Đình Diệm's electoral base by organizing and supervising the election process.

description.zh-cn: 保大帝设立了皇朝疆土这一特殊行政区，由其直接管辖。
description.en: Bảo Đại established the Domaine de la Couronne as a special administrative area under his direct rule.

description.zh-cn: 皇朝疆土是越南国内部的一个特殊行政区。
description.en: The Domaine de la Couronne was a special administrative area within the State of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 皇朝疆土于1955年3月11日被废除，时任总理为吴廷琰。
description.en: The Domaine de la Couronne was abolished on March 11, 1955, when Ngô Đình Diệm was Prime Minister.
